long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a calendar of basketball games, and links to watch them. Upon selecting a game the user is redirected to the League Pass game feed in a new tab, and any scores or spoilers are hidden from view using CSS changes.
